email_chain.subject: Request for Vessel Availability - Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 50,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms. Could you please provide vessel availability and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability - Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 75,000, LOA 225m, for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 25 per MT. Laycan is 1-5 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability - Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 22 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability - Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Given the volume of your shipment, I can revise the rate to USD 23 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 96 hours. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Vessel Availability - Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

USD 23 per MT works for us. Please proceed with the booking for the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of 1-5 October. Kindly send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great, I will proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thanks for your assistance!

Best regards,
Emily Carter
